models.name: task_management_roles
models.description: Task Management Roles define distinct user roles like TPM, PM, Developer, etc. These roles control access and permissions within the task management system. This table serves as a foundational system configuration for role-based authorization and is referenced by user and assignment tables.

plainFields.name: code
plainFields.description: Unique code identifier for the role, e.g., 'TPM', 'PM', 'Developer'.

plainFields.name: name
plainFields.description: Human-readable name of the role, e.g., 'Technical Project Manager'.

plainFields.name: description
plainFields.description: Detailed description explaining the role's responsibilities and permissions.

plainFields.name: created_at
plainFields.description: Timestamp when the role record was created.

plainFields.name: updated_at
plainFields.description: Timestamp when the role record was last updated.

models.name: task_management_task_statuses
models.description: Task Management Task Statuses define the possible states a task can have, such as 'To Do', 'In Progress', and 'Done'. This table controls workflow states and is referenced by task lifecycle tables for state management.

plainFields.name: code
plainFields.description: Unique code representing the task status, e.g., 'to_do', 'in_progress', 'done'.

plainFields.name: name
plainFields.description: Human-readable status name, e.g., 'To Do', 'In Progress', 'Done'.

plainFields.name: description
plainFields.description: Detailed explanation of the status and its significance in the workflow.

plainFields.name: created_at
plainFields.description: Timestamp indicating when the status was created.

plainFields.name: updated_at
plainFields.description: Timestamp indicating when the status was last modified.

models.name: task_management_priorities
models.description: Task Management Priorities define the level of urgency or importance for tasks, such as low, medium, or high. These settings influence task sorting and alerting mechanisms within the system.

plainFields.name: code
plainFields.description: Unique code representing priority level, e.g., 'low', 'medium', 'high'.

plainFields.name: name
plainFields.description: Human-friendly priority name, e.g., 'Low', 'Medium', 'High'.

plainFields.name: description
plainFields.description: Detailed notes about the priority's impact and usage rules.

plainFields.name: created_at
plainFields.description: Timestamp when the priority record was created.

plainFields.name: updated_at
plainFields.description: Timestamp when the priority record was last updated.

models.name: task_management_tpm
models.description: Technical Project Manager (TPM) information including login credentials and contact details. Independent business entity representing TPM users within the system with full CRUD capability and role-based authentication.

plainFields.name: email
plainFields.description: Email address used for login and contact, unique across TPM users.

plainFields.name: password_hash
plainFields.description: Hashed password for secure authentication.

plainFields.name: name
plainFields.description: Full name of the TPM user.

plainFields.name: created_at
plainFields.description: Record creation timestamp.

plainFields.name: updated_at
plainFields.description: Record last update timestamp.

plainFields.name: deleted_at
plainFields.description: Soft delete timestamp to enable recovery.

plainFields.name: password_hash

plainFields.name: name

models.name: task_management_pmo

plainFields.name: email
plainFields.description: Email address used for login and contact, unique across PMO users.

plainFields.name: password_hash
plainFields.description: Hashed password for secure authentication.

plainFields.name: name

plainFields.name: created_at
plainFields.description: Record creation timestamp.

plainFields.name: updated_at

models.name: task_management_developer
models.description: Developer user information including secure login credentials. Independent business entity representing developer users with full control for user management and authentication.

plainFields.name: email
plainFields.description: Email address used for login and contact, unique across developers.

plainFields.name: password_hash
plainFields.description: Hashed password supporting secure login.

plainFields.name: name
plainFields.description: Full name of the developer user.

plainFields.name: created_at
plainFields.description: Timestamp when the record was created.

plainFields.name: updated_at

models.name: task_management_designer
models.description: Designer user information with authentication credentials and identity details. Core independent business entity for managing designer user accounts securely.

plainFields.name: email
plainFields.description: Unique email address for designer login and communications.

plainFields.name: password_hash
plainFields.description: Hashed password for secure authentication.

plainFields.name: name
plainFields.description: Full name of the designer user.

plainFields.name: created_at
plainFields.description: Record creation timestamp.

plainFields.name: updated_at

models.name: task_management_qa
models.description: Quality Assurance (QA) user details including authentication data. Independent user entity supporting role-based management and secure login for QA team members.

plainFields.name: email
plainFields.description: Email address unique to QA users for login and contact.

plainFields.name: password_hash
plainFields.description: Hashed password ensuring authentication security.

plainFields.name: name
plainFields.description: Full name of the QA user.

plainFields.name: created_at
plainFields.description: Timestamp for when the record was created.

plainFields.name: updated_at
plainFields.description: Timestamp for the latest update of the record.

plainFields.name: deleted_at
plainFields.description: Optional timestamp for soft deletion enabling recovery.

models.name: task_management_tasks
models.description: Primary table representing the core tasks in the system, including title, description, status, priority, due date, creator info, and timestamps. Tasks have independent lifecycle management and relate to statuses, priorities, projects, and boards via foreign keys. Supports soft delete and audit fields.

foreignFields.name: status_id
foreignFields.description: Referenced task status. {@link task_management_task_statuses.id}.

foreignFields.name: priority_id
foreignFields.description: Referenced task priority level. {@link task_management_priorities.id}.

foreignFields.name: creator_id
foreignFields.description: Task creator user ID. References one of the user roles. {@link task_management_tpm.id}, etc.

foreignFields.name: project_id
foreignFields.description: Project this task belongs to. {@link task_management_projects.id}.

foreignFields.name: board_id
foreignFields.description: Board this task belongs to. {@link task_management_boards.id}.

plainFields.name: title
plainFields.description: Title of the task, mandatory and non-empty.

plainFields.name: description
plainFields.description: Detailed description of the task, optional.

plainFields.name: status_name
plainFields.description: Name of status (denormalized for easy querying). Usually synced with status table.

plainFields.name: priority_name
plainFields.description: Name of priority level for easier display, optional.

plainFields.name: due_date
plainFields.description: Optional due date and time for task deadline.

plainFields.name: created_at
plainFields.description: Timestamp of record creation.

plainFields.name: updated_at
plainFields.description: Timestamp of last update.

plainFields.name: deleted_at
plainFields.description: Soft deletion timestamp if the task is deleted.

models.name: task_management_task_assignments
models.description: Records assignments of users to tasks, allowing multiple assignees per task. Supports auditing of assignment changes with timestamps. Users can be TPMs, PMs, Developers, Designers, or QA roles referenced via user foreign keys.

foreignFields.name: task_id
foreignFields.description: References the assigned task. {@link task_management_tasks.id}.

foreignFields.name: assignee_id
foreignFields.description: User assigned to the task. References user role tables such as {@link task_management_tpm.id}, {@link task_management_pm.id}, etc.

plainFields.name: assigned_at
plainFields.description: Timestamp when assignment occurred.

models.name: task_management_task_comments
models.description: Stores comments made by users on tasks. Each comment references the task and commenting user. Supports soft delete and auditing timestamps.

foreignFields.name: task_id
foreignFields.description: Commented task reference. {@link task_management_tasks.id}.

foreignFields.name: commenter_id
foreignFields.description: User who made the comment. References user role tables such as {@link task_management_developer.id}, {@link task_management_designer.id}, etc.

plainFields.name: comment_body
plainFields.description: Content of the comment.

plainFields.name: created_at
plainFields.description: Timestamp of comment creation.

plainFields.name: updated_at
plainFields.description: Timestamp of last update to comment.

plainFields.name: deleted_at
plainFields.description: Soft delete timestamp if comment is deleted.

models.name: task_management_task_status_changes
models.description: Logs changes to a task's status over time for auditing and history tracking. Each record references a task and the new status applied. Includes timestamp of change and optional comments explaining status transition.

foreignFields.name: task_id
foreignFields.description: Task whose status changed. {@link task_management_tasks.id}.

foreignFields.name: new_status_id
foreignFields.description: New status set on the task. {@link task_management_task_statuses.id}.

plainFields.name: changed_at
plainFields.description: Timestamp when the status was changed.

plainFields.name: comment
plainFields.description: Optional comment explaining the reason for status change.

models.name: task_management_projects
models.description: Project entity representing distinct projects for task grouping and management within the system. Projects have unique codes, descriptive names, owners, and standard temporal audit fields. They act as primary containers for related boards and tasks, supporting structured project workflows. References owners from existing user tables via foreign keys and supports soft deletion with deletion timestamps.

foreignFields.name: owner_id
foreignFields.description: Owner user reference. {@link task_management_tpm.id} or equivalent user table.

plainFields.name: code
plainFields.description: Unique code identifier for the project.

plainFields.name: name
plainFields.description: Descriptive name of the project.

plainFields.name: description
plainFields.description: Optional detailed description of the project.

plainFields.name: created_at
plainFields.description: Creation timestamp.

plainFields.name: updated_at
plainFields.description: Timestamp of last update.

plainFields.name: deleted_at
plainFields.description: Optional timestamp indicating soft deletion.

models.name: task_management_boards
models.description: Board entity representing logical groupings of tasks within projects. Boards have unique codes, descriptive names, project associations, owners, and temporal audit fields. They enable task organization and management distinct from projects and support soft deletion.

foreignFields.name: project_id
foreignFields.description: Associated project reference. {@link task_management_projects.id}.

foreignFields.name: owner_id
foreignFields.description: Board owner user reference. {@link task_management_tpm.id} or equivalent user table.

plainFields.name: code
plainFields.description: Unique board code within the project.

plainFields.name: name
plainFields.description: Descriptive name of the board.

plainFields.name: description
plainFields.description: Optional detailed description of the board.

plainFields.name: created_at
plainFields.description: Creation timestamp.

plainFields.name: updated_at
plainFields.description: Timestamp of last update.

plainFields.name: deleted_at
plainFields.description: Optional timestamp indicating soft deletion.

models.name: task_management_board_members
models.description: Membership entity connecting users to boards to represent membership associations. Supports multiple members per board, with unique constraints to prevent duplicate memberships. Includes references to user and board entities, and temporal audit fields for membership tracking.

foreignFields.name: board_id
foreignFields.description: Associated board reference. {@link task_management_boards.id}.

foreignFields.name: user_id
foreignFields.description: Member user reference. {@link task_management_tpm.id} or equivalent user table.

plainFields.name: created_at
plainFields.description: Creation timestamp of membership record.

plainFields.name: updated_at
plainFields.description: Last update timestamp of membership record.

plainFields.name: deleted_at
plainFields.description: Optional timestamp indicating soft deletion.

models.name: task_management_project_members
models.description: Membership entity connecting users to projects with membership roles and assignment tracking. Ensures unique membership via composite keys. Includes references to projects and users, and audit timestamps for membership lifecycle management.

foreignFields.name: project_id
foreignFields.description: Associated project reference. {@link task_management_projects.id}.

foreignFields.name: user_id
foreignFields.description: Member user reference. {@link task_management_tpm.id} or equivalent user table.

plainFields.name: created_at
plainFields.description: Creation timestamp of membership record.

plainFields.name: updated_at
plainFields.description: Last update timestamp of membership record.

plainFields.name: deleted_at
plainFields.description: Optional timestamp indicating soft deletion.

models.name: task_management_notifications
models.description: This table stores notifications generated by the system related to task events, assignments, status changes, and general alerts for users. Each notification tracks the target user, related task if any, notification type, read status, and timestamps. It serves as the primary entity for user alerts within the task management system.

foreignFields.name: user_id
foreignFields.description: Target user's {@link task_management_tpm.id}, {@link task_management_pm.id}, {@link task_management_pmo.id}, {@link task_management_developer.id}, {@link task_management_designer.id}, or {@link task_management_qa.id}.

foreignFields.name: task_id
foreignFields.description: Related task's {@link task_management_tasks.id}, nullable for general or system notifications.

plainFields.name: notification_type
plainFields.description: Type of notification such as 'assignment', 'status_change', 'comment', 'general'.

plainFields.name: is_read
plainFields.description: Flag indicating whether the notification has been read by the user.

plainFields.name: read_at
plainFields.description: Timestamp when the notification was read. Null if unread.

plainFields.name: created_at
plainFields.description: Timestamp when the notification was created.

plainFields.name: updated_at
plainFields.description: Timestamp when the notification record was last updated.

plainFields.name: deleted_at
plainFields.description: Timestamp when the notification was deleted (soft delete). Nullable if not deleted.

models.name: task_management_notification_preferences
models.description: This table stores individual user preferences for receiving different types of notifications within the task management system. Preferences specify which notification categories a user opts into and notification delivery options such as email or push notifications.

foreignFields.name: user_id
foreignFields.description: User owning these notification preferences, referencing their role table such as {@link task_management_tpm.id}, {@link task_management_pm.id}, {@link task_management_pmo.id}, {@link task_management_developer.id}, {@link task_management_designer.id}, or {@link task_management_qa.id}.

plainFields.name: preference_key
plainFields.description: Notification preference key, e.g. 'assignment', 'status_change', 'comment', indicating the type of notification this preference controls.

plainFields.name: enabled
plainFields.description: Indicates if the notification preference is enabled or disabled.

plainFields.name: delivery_method
plainFields.description: Preferred method for notification delivery, such as 'email', 'push', or 'sms'.

plainFields.name: created_at
plainFields.description: Timestamp when the preference was created.

plainFields.name: updated_at
plainFields.description: Timestamp when the preference was last updated.

plainFields.name: deleted_at
plainFields.description: Timestamp when the preference was deleted (soft delete). Nullable if not deleted.
